snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes Draw Something taking over the top spot from Angry Birds, online movies ready to pass DVDs and Blue-ray discs...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes Draw Something taking over the top spot from Angry Birds, online movies ready to pass DVDs and Blue-ray discs and the Obama campaign's technological innovation.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Harsh Words for Electronic Arts, and New Emoji
